struct Node {
 int content[ROW][COL]; // æ•°æ®æˆå‘˜
 int r;
 int c;
 Node* parent;

 // æ„é€ å‡½æ•°å£°æ˜
 Node();

 // æˆå‘˜å‡½æ•°å£°æ˜
 void print();
 void set_value(int row, int col, int value, Node* p=nullptr);

 Node* left();
 Node* right();

 bool operator==(const Node& other) const;
 bool operator!=(const Node& other) const;
 bool operator<(const Node& other) const;

};
